Text:
Skip from download the Hungarian dub file xXx State of the Union (2005).Magyar (300 MB) if you don't want it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Those with Win 7 64 bit seem to have issues with playing back seccondary or external audio tracks & subs etc.
Much better then k-lite pack( too complicated ) is CCCP (    http://www.cccp-project.net/    ) using the same player MPC).
When installing leave all as it is (default). When finished open the player, click View/Options/PlaybackOutput/check Evr Costum Pres & chose System Default under DirectShow Audio.
Under Internal Filters - Source Filters should be checked DirectShow Media, Matroska & MP4 and Transform Filters should have H264/AVC(DXVA) checked. Now I can even play Blue-ray m2ts being able to switch between Audio tracks by clicking on the Haali Media Spliter on the task bar bottom right. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Sziaztok Magyarok,
a nevemre kattintva fogsz több magyar & szinkronizált filmeket találni.
Pipald be a xXx State of the Union (2005).Magyar fajlt is mert az a magyar szinkron hang. Nem muszalj azt bemux-olni de ha akarod hasznalj mkvmerge GUI progit. Használj media player classic-ot ( http://www.cccp-project.net/ ) hogy automatikusan felismerje és lejátssza a külön levö AC3 szinkron fájlokat. Bátran kérdezz ha nem tudsz valamit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
